Package model.core

Class Currency

java.lang.Object
model.core.Currency
public class Currency extends Object
The Currency class represents the currency used in the vending machine application. It keeps track of the number of one, five, and ten currency units. Users can interact with this class to set and get the number of currency units, calculate the total amount of currency, replenish money, and reset the currency counts.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Currency()
    Constructs a new Currency object with all currency counts initialized to zero.
